p: In the melanin content assay, the absorbance of the same number of cells across AVO concentrations (10-30 μg·mL −1) was measured in order to exclude the possibility that a rise in melanin content may be induced by the cell proliferating effect of AVO. We found that melanin levels were increased in B16 cells in a dose-dependent manner after the treatment of AVO ( Figure 2(a)). At the concentration of 10-30 μg·mL −1, the melanin content showed concentration-dependent increase, while the concentration of 20-30 μg·mL −1 showed significant increase in melanin content. The effect of AVO on tyrosinase activity did not show significant difference compared with untreated group ( Figure 2(b)); however it showed a rise trend.
